DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether topical bevacizumab is safe or not when used in corneal neovascularization for long term period.
DOC.brief_title: Corneal Thinning During Topical Bevacizumab Therapy
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of corneal neovascularization must be able to apply eyedrop have active keratitis
